> comparison_data <- clean_data %>%
+   filter(status %in% c("acquired", "closed"))
> 
> avg_profile <- comparison_data %>%
+   group_by(status) %>%
+   summarise(
+     avg_funding_musd    = mean(funding_total_usd,  na.rm = TRUE) / 1e6,
+     median_funding_musd = median(funding_total_usd, na.rm = TRUE) / 1e6,
+     avg_rounds          = mean(funding_rounds,      na.rm = TRUE),
+     median_rounds       = median(funding_rounds,    na.rm = TRUE),
+     .groups = "drop"
+   )
> 
> plot_df2 <- avg_profile %>%
+   select(
+     status,
+     `Avg funding (M USD)`    = avg_funding_musd,
+     `Median funding (M USD)` = median_funding_musd,
+     `Avg rounds`             = avg_rounds,
+     `Median rounds`          = median_rounds
+   ) %>%
+   pivot_longer(
+     cols      = -status,
+     names_to  = "metric",
+     values_to = "value"
+   ) %>%
+   mutate(
+     metric_type = if_else(grepl("funding", metric),
+                           "Funding (USD)", "Rounds")
+   )
> 
> plot_df2$metric <- factor(
+   plot_df2$metric,
+   levels = c("Avg funding (M USD)",
+              "Median funding (M USD)",
+              "Avg rounds",
+              "Median rounds")
+ )
> 
> ggplot(plot_df2,
+        aes(x = metric, y = value,
+            color = status, group = status)) +
+   geom_point(size = 3) +
+   geom_line(linewidth = 1) +
+   facet_wrap(~ metric_type, scales = "free_y") +
+   labs(
+     title = "Average Profile: Acquired vs Closed Startups",
+     x = "",
+     y = "Value",
+     color = "Status"
+   ) +
+   theme_minimal(base_size = 14) +
+   theme(
+     axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 20, hjust = 1),
+     strip.text  = element_text(size = 13, face = "bold"),
+     panel.grid.minor = element_blank()
+   )
